#include<stdio.h>

long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
{
        long long c;
        while(b>0)
                c=a%b,a=b,b=c;
        return a;
}

long long nck(long long n,long long k)
{
        long long result=1;
        long long i;

        if(k>n-k) k=n-k;
        for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
        {
                long long l=gcd(result,i);
                result/=l;
                result*=(n-i+1)/(i/l);
        }
        return result;
}

int main()
{
        long long n,k,result;

        scanf("%llu %llu",&n,&k);
        result=nck(n+k,k);
        printf("%llu\n",result);
        return 0;
}
